attributes.action: Do not accept any more Asylum seekers, Refugees or Illegal immigrants.
attributes.additional_details: We the British people have to put an end to this mass migration as the government has not got the backbone to do what is necessary. There is an on-line petition with a 100,000 votes for Britain to accept 1000s of Syrian migrants lets counter that vote by voting not to accept them.
attributes.background: The majority of Migrants flooding into the UK  are economic migrants  Most are criminals including  murderers and paedophiles. They have little if any morals,They have no eduction or skills to offer and will either be on benefits or lead a life of crime once in the UK.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107117

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
